content: If you are having trouble clicking on Foamy Radio, it's caused by the snow that's on the page and IE 9 not paying well together. If you have another web browser (Firefox or Chrome, for example), it might be easier to use it. Otherwise, you can go here and click on the shuffle button under "christmas". Sadly, you will need to type it in: http://foamtotem.org/radio
description: Go to foamtotem.org/radio directly if the Foamy snow keeps you from using Foamy Radio.
title: IE9 Doesn't Like Snow
